testcase.name: Add Cost Centre
testcase.system-out: Given I launch chrome browser...............................................passed When I open Url "https://www.syncoffice.com/module-test-dashboard/dashboard".passed Then I Click on login button................................................passed And I enter UserName "damawalemidc@gmail.com" And Password "Creta_123"......passed And I Click on Login........................................................passed And Click on Account Reconciliation tab.....................................passed Then Hover on Right Side panel Cost Center..................................passed And Click on Cost Center....................................................passed And Click on Add Button on View Cost Center.................................passed And Enter Code on Cost Center...............................................passed And Enter Enter Description on Cost Center..................................passed And Enter Remarks on Cost Center............................................passed And Click on Save on Cost Center............................................passed And Search Cost Centre which is currently added............................passed And Delete Cost Centre......................................................passed
